Posts.EditableText:
[_Desktop TA for Quest 5.8_]

**LAST UPDATE (3/6/2022)** -- Various minor fixes/improvements.  This should fix the display of the opening screen.  As before, the picture frame height can be customized in-game:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ln-6QhYEbZmSnmS1svSFKHsMKbqQdjG_/view?usp=sharing

There are no viruses in the download (about 250 MB)!  Your memory resources may affect how well the game runs.

Message me if you need a hint.  Thanks!
